data.eml:eml: Description of Nasocoris lautereri sp. nov. from the Balkan peninsula, with a review of the genus Nasocoris (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kment, Petr, Bryja, Josef (2007): Description of Nasocoris lautereri sp. nov. from the Balkan peninsula, with a review of the genus Nasocoris (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae). Zootaxa 1633: 39-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179468
